flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Oak door slabs can be recycled into furniture you can use for many years to come and even pass down to future generations of your family.
guide.introduction_rendered: Oak door slabs can be recycled into furniture you can use for many years to come and even pass down to future generations of your family.

lines.text: Measure your walls in the desk location to determine your overall desk size.
lines.text_raw: Measure your walls in the desk location to determine your overall desk size.

lines.text: Measure the sizes of your devices and start designing the layout of your custom desk.
lines.text_raw: Measure the sizes of your devices and start designing the layout of your custom desk.

lines.text: Next, start cutting all your parts to the correct sizes.
lines.text_raw: Next, start cutting all your parts to the correct sizes.

lines.text: Sand all of the wooden pieces smooth.
lines.text_raw: Sand all of the wooden pieces smooth.

lines.text: Finish with stain or paint them whatever color you'd like them to be.
lines.text_raw: Finish with stain or paint them whatever color you'd like them to be.

lines.text: Add your home electronic devices and run all the wires out of sight. We're going for a very clean, crisp, and sharp look here.
lines.text_raw: Add your home electronic devices and run all the wires out of sight. We're going for a very clean, crisp, and sharp look here.

guide.summary: Recycle a solid-core oak interior door into a custom-built computer desk.
guide.title: Custom Computer Desk
